scripts.build:docker: docker build --target app --build-arg gh_token=$GITHUB_PAT -f src/Dockerfile -t docker.io/coriverse/shinyapps:amplify-bcat-alpha src
scripts.deploy:docker: npm run build && npm run build:docker && docker push docker.io/coriverse/shinyapps:amplify-bcat-alpha
scripts.dev:fullstack-graphql-book: start npm run start:fullstack-graphql-book && npm run dev
scripts.dev:docker: npm run build:dev && npm run build:docker && docker run -it --entrypoint Rscript -p 3000:3000 -p 3838:3838 -p 5174:5174 --rm docker.io/coriverse/shinyapps:amplify-bcat-alpha /srv/shiny-server/bcat-alpha/.exec-shiny-app.R . 5174
scripts.dev:linux: npm run start & npm run dev
scripts.dev:windows: start npm run dev:docker && npm run dev
scripts.docker: npm run build && npm run build:docker && docker run -p 3000:3000 --rm docker.io/coriverse/shinyapps:amplify-bcat-alpha
scripts.postinstall: npm run patch && npm install --legacy-peer-deps --no-save "@material-ui/core"@"^4.12.4" ts-node
